Home » 17A9 Navakanipātapāḷi » 2 Dutiyapaṇṇāsaka » 2.2 Satipaṭṭhānavagga
2.2.5 Orambhāgiyasutta
Dutiyapaṇṇāsaka
Satipaṭṭhānavagga
Orambhāgiyasutta
67.
448“Pañcimāni, bhikkhave, orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni. Katamāni pañca? Sakkāyadiṭṭhi, vicikicchā, sīlabbataparāmāso, kāmacchando, byāpādo—  imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañcorambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni.
449Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānāya…pe…  ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvetabbā”ti.
450Pañcamaṃ.
